A4.text: The Church of Sweden (Swedish: Svenska kyrkan) is the largest Christian church in Sweden, and also the largest religious body. The church professes the Lutheran faith

A5.text: As of 2024, it had 5,426.053 members, 51,4 % of the Swedish population
